story_text: A bug named Gus loves to hum under the sun.
One day, Gus found a cup full of yummy nuts.
story_images: A cheerful bug named Gus sitting under the bright sun, humming happily.
Gus, the bug, looking surprised and delighted at a cup filled with a variety of nuts.

questions.question: What does Gus love to do under the sun?
What did Gus find in the story?
